inst_descr: Ministry of Labour of the Repu

outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to assist the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection of Kazakhstan in implementation of social policies to improve delivery of special social services, with a focus on persons with disabilities, and to facilitate poverty reduction policy.
These efforts include:
•    promoting implementation of the 2012-2018 Action Plan to Ensure Rights and Improve the Quality of Life for People with Disabilities in the Republic of Kazakhstan
•	putting a system of special social service standards in place
•	implementing and improving deinstitutionalization of medical and social institutions
•	streamlining the state social benefit system

project_descr: Improvement of the Social protection system in line with international standarts
project_title: Improvement of social protection system in Kazakhstan
